content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft polished granite, I need to place 4 granite blocks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one block of granite from slot 41 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I will move another block of granite from slot 41 into slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]
thought: Then, I will move another block of granite from slot 41 into slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last block of granite from slot 41 into slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]

thought: Now that the granite blocks have been placed in the crafting grid, I can craft the polished granite by moving the resulting item from slot 0 (the crafting slot) to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
